name: Two Tamarind Seeds
description:
This is a little experiment made with a great tool: Bitsy Game Maker by Adam Le Doux!

Two Tamarind Seeds has been developed during the third monthly Bitsy Jam (theme: "Daydream") and it's a short story about common things, the sense of familiarity of certain situations, the (day)dream of a simple life and... A naive idea of love.

CONTROL SCHEME

- ARROWS/WASD = walk, talk, etc.
[mouse is supported but not "guaranteed": if you use it, sometimes you will be forced to interact with arrows/wasd!]

SECRETS?!

Yeah, the game contains some secrets! But how are you supposed to find them if everything seems so straight-forward? Maybe the solution is what you can see but is out of reach, or vice versa what you can reach but is... Invisible?

Hope you enjoy the game, and do not hesitate to contact me for suggestions, ideas, bug reports and/or "hints"!! :D <3
